ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Blended with the water of Tasnim, (heights ultimate of evolution),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: a wine whose mixture is Tasnim,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: With the wine is a drink from Tasnim,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And it is mixed with Tasneem.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It will be mixed with Tasnim:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the admixture of it is a water of Tasnim,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And mixed with water of Tasnim,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: a wine tempered with the waters of Tasnim,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And admixture thereof will be Water of Tasnim:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and whose seasoning is from Tasneem,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: With it will be (given) a mixture of Tasnim:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It (that wine) will be mixed with Tasnim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:27] and whose mixture, that is to say, that with which it is mixed, is of Tasnīm, which is explained by His [following] words:
